title: What resemblance, if any, is there between Paganini and J. Hendrix? - Quora

response.answer_text: They were both male, long-haired, thin, and musicians. That's where the similarity ends. They weren't even close to the same height. Paganini was 5′5″, while Hendrix was 5′11″. Paganini had muttonchop sideburns; Hendrix had a mustache. They could both play like the devil. Is that the resemblance you're referring to? Of the two, Paganini was the greater virtuoso. Have you ever listened to his caprices? Nicolo Paganini   Jimi Hendrix   Paganini Caprice No. 24 in A minor
